nodes.name: actions-gh-pages
nodes.description: GitHub Actions for GitHub Pages 🚀 Deploy static files and publish your site easily. Static-Site-Generators-friendly.

nodes.name: actions-hugo
nodes.description: GitHub Actions for Hugo ⚡️ Setup Hugo quickly and build your site fast. Hugo extended, Hugo Modules, Linux (Ubuntu), macOS, and Windows are supported.

nodes.name: emoji-ime-dictionary
nodes.description: 日本語で絵文字入力をするための IME 追加辞書 📙 Google 日本語入力などで日本語から絵文字への変換を可能にする IME 拡張辞書です

nodes.name: actions-mdbook

nodes.name: actions-label-commenter
nodes.description: Label Commenter Action - Label triggered GitHub Actions for posting a template message. After commenting, it can automatically close or reopen issues. Of course, it also can manage pull requests.

nodes.name: mkdocs-material-boilerplate
nodes.description: MkDocs Material Boilerplate (Starter Kit) - Deploy documentation to hosting platforms (Netlify, GitHub Pages, GitLab Pages, and AWS Amplify Console) with CircleCI, Docker, pipenv, GitHub Actions

nodes.name: google-ime-dictionary
nodes.description: 日英変換・英語略語展開のための IME 追加辞書 📙 日本語から英語への和英変換や英語略語の展開を Google 日本語入力や ATOK などで可能にする IME 拡張辞書です
